args:
During their investigation of the disappearances
happening in Grastaea, the prince and his friends
were given a mysterious object by Astorius and
set about investigating it.
Hey, Sophie. I hear you've been looking\nat that slimy thing Astorius gave us?
I have—and for lack of a better word,\nthe mana in it is very...unusual.
It resembled the mana of a dragon,\nbut is too distorted to actually BE that.
I'm sorry, but I'm going to need more\ntime before I can tell you anything\nwith any kind of certainty.
It's me. Albert. How have you been,\nPrince {player_name}?
Leader of the Knights of Levin\nAlbert
Albert! I haven't seen you since you\nleft to try and find your friend!\nHow did all of that pan out?
I searched high and low, but in the end\ncould find no trace of him.
But then I heard about the all-too-familiar\ndisappearances that have been happening\nhere and hurried back with all speed.
What's happening here is similar to what\noccurred in my homeland during our crisis\nwith the seeds of the abyss.
Which means it's possible that\nYurius is somehow involved.
The friend I'm searching for? Yes.
Though to be honest, I have doubts as to\nwhether or not he still names me friend.
After all, he fled with one of the seeds\nthat almost drove our kingdom to ruin.\nAnd yet, I cannot bring myself to...
I don't want to reopen old wounds,\nbut would you be willing to tell me\nwhat happened between you two?
I would—but as you said,\nit is a tale most melancholy.
Still, if it might give us clues for bringing\nthis crisis to an end, I think it's something\nwe all need to hear.
Then let me tell you of all that occurred\nbefore we parted ways for good and all.
Several Years Prior\nThe Kingdom of Levin
Yurius and I had been friends since childhood,\nand I felt certain our relationship was strong\nenough to weather the test of time.
...Are you all right? I hear you've been\nshutting yourself in here for a while now.
Was His Majesty lashing out at you again?
Yes, but when does he not? I've not met\nhis expectations since the day I was born.
The same blood may flow in our veins,\nyet I'm still naught but a loathsome\ndisappointment to the man.
How I wish I had been born\ninto your family instead.

Everyone of your bloodline has the power
to control lightning in service to the royal
family, yes? Oh, it must be so wonderful
to have such an ability!

...But what am I thinking? With my luck,
I would have been the first of your line
to be born without that power—for my
only gift is that of failure.
Don't be so hard on yourself, Yurius.\nI'm honored to have a friend as kind\nand intelligent as you.
Thank you, my friend. You are the\nonly one to ever speak so of me.
In truth, the only place in this kingdom\nwhere I truly feel at ease is at your side.

But after I succeeded in destroying one of the
seeds of the abyss—and my father along with it—
I was branded a hero. And our relationship was
never the same after that...
Yurius, stop! That way leads to the sealed\nstorehouse; what business have you there?
My business has nothing to do\nwith you, ＂hero＂!
Of course it does! We are best friends,\nand always have been so!
＂We feel the next king should be the\nThunderswift Lord, Albert—not Yurius.＂
You've heard such talk, yes? It's all any of\nthe ministers can speak of lately.
Those are just rumors! I would never—
All this time, I thought we were the same!\nBut now I see you plan to abandon me\njust like all the others!
Unlike you, my father never bequeathed\nme anything—so if I want power, I can\ndo naught but seize it for myself!
Once I have power, everyone will HAVE\nto acknowledge me! I refuse to toil in\nworthless obscurity for the rest of my days!
Before long, the fateful day arrived\nwhen our destinies parted...
I finally have it! The seed of the abyss\nis mine! Aaaah ha ha ha!
No, Yurius! The seeds are too dangerous!\nYou must stay away from them!
You know as well as I how many of\nour fellows fell to their vile sway.
You're smarter and more capable\nthan anyone—AND you're royalty!\nYou have no need for such things!
Ha! A hero who has everything and is\nrespected by everyone could NEVER\nunderstand my feelings!
Still, old friend, let me give you the finest\nseat in the house to the tragedy that is\nabout to unfold! For now I shall—GAAAH!
Nnngh... This power is too much for me...\nI must find some way to control it if I\nwant to have my revenge!
...The rest of the story is known to you.\nI pursued my friend over hill and dale until\nthe trail led me here to South Grastaea.
On the orders of His Majesty, I am to find\nthe man who stole the accursed seed that\nerases all life and...deal with him.
Yes. It is just what is happening here.\nWhich leads me to think the item you\nfound is, in truth, part of a seed.
Perhaps Yurius finally found a way to\ncontrol the seed and feels emboldened\nenough to act in the open now.
I wanted to separate the seed from him\nbefore they fully merged into one.\nI wanted to...save him.
But I fear I may be too late. Now, the only\nway to destroy that seed might be to\ntake the life of my oldest friend.
Please don't give up hope just yet.
You're friends—maybe your words will\nbe able to affect the seed through him!
I fear we're past the point where mere\nwords can reach him—even mine.
And as I said, I doubt he sees me as a\nfriend anymore. The opposite, if anything.
I can hear how important he is just by\nhow you talk about him, and I'm sure\nhe still feels the same for you.
If I can understand that, he will, too.\nThis is all going to work out.
I cannot say I share your confidence,\nbut I appreciate it nonetheless.
Yes, well, this is no time for sulking.\nWill you let me aid your investigation?
We'd be glad to have you.
